bug.summary: missing lang value in meta.json when pickling zh lang
bug.description:
when I try to run follow script: <denchmark-code>import spacy nlp = spacy.blank("zh", vector=False) nlp.to_disk("./zh_model") spacy.load("./zh_model")
</denchmark-code>
I got the follow issue: <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/zqh/mygit/Rasa_NLU_Chi-master/spacy_test/load_wv.py", line 4, in <module> spacy.load("./zh_model") File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy-2.0.5-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg/spacy/__init__.py", line 19, in load return util.load_model(name, **overrides) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy-2.0.5-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg/spacy/util.py", line 116, in load_model return load_model_from_path(Path(name), **overrides) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy-2.0.5-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg/spacy/util.py", line 144, in load_model_from_path meta = get_model_meta(model_path) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacy-2.0.5-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg/spacy/util.py", line 196, in get_model_meta raise ValueError(msg % setting) ValueError: No valid 'lang' setting found in model meta.json </denchmark-code>
when reading the source code, I find this may because code in file <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/blob/master/spacy/lang/zh/__init__.py>lang/zh/init.py</denchmark-link> have not created and realized the subclass of Language.Defaults . I also find pull request <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/pull/1210>#1210</denchmark-link> may solve this problem but can`t be merged since other things. So may I pull a request to solve this problem for this issue. <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: ubuntu 14.0.1 Python Version Used: python 3.6 spaCy Version Used: 2.0.5 Environment Information:
